feed.title: Pruning non-transaction data instead of pruning whole blocks?

entry.title: Pruning non-transaction data instead of pruning whole blocks?
entry.summary: I'm sorry, but without the actual content or context of the email you're referring to, I cannot create a summary or blog post based on it. Please provide the specific details or content from the email that you would like summarized into a blog post format following your outlined rules.
